member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the syndication resource handler utilizes cache-specific HTTP headers and the output cache.
member.value: true if handler caching is enabled, otherwise returns false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the default syndication content format processed by the syndication resource handler.
member.value: A enumeration value that indcates the default syndication content format processed by the syndication resource handler. The default value is , which indicates that by default RSS feed information is retrieved for the application.

member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the content that the syndication resource handler should generate.
member.value: An object that represents the unique identifier of the syndication resource served by the syndication resource handler. The default value is , which indicates that no unique identifier was specified.

member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.UpdatableWithin
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of time after which clients may perform a background check and optional fetch of new content.
member.value: A that indicates to the browser that if the content is modified by the server and the resource is requested by the user within the specified time span to period, the browser displays the information found in the local cache but also performs a background check and optional fetch of the new content on the server. The default value is 15 minutes.

member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.ValidFor
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of time in which the handler content can be expected to not change.
member.value: A that indicates to the browser that the content will not change for the specified time span and instructs it to retrieve the content directly from the local cache. The default value is 60 minutes.

member.name: P:Argotic.Configuration.SyndicationResourceHandlerSection.Properties
member.summary: Gets the configuration properties for this section.
member.value: A object that represents the configuration properties for this section.

member.name: T:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink
member.summary: A control that enables the auto-discovery of syndicated content by generating a header link that describes the syndication resource.

remarks.para: Auto-discovery is a technique that makes it possible for browsers and other software to automatically find a web site's syndication feeds and other resources. Supported by Mozilla Firefox 2.0, Microsoft Internet Explorer 7.0 and other browsers, autodiscovery has become the best way to inform users that a web site offers a syndication feed. When a browser loads a page and discovers that a feed is available, Firefox and Internet Explorer display the common feed icon in the address bar.
This implementation conforms to the RSS Autodiscovery 1.0 guidelines as close as possible, which can be found at http://www.rssboard.org/rss-autodiscovery.

Regardless of whether the control is placed within the head section of an ASP.NET page or somewhere within the body of an ASP.NET page, the auto-discovery link will be written within the head section of the page, as client browsers that support syndication auto-discovery expect it to be located in this HTML section.

member.name: M:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the PreRender event.
member.param: An object that contains the event data.

remarks.para: This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary pre-rendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content.
During this step in the ASP.NET page life-cycle, the will attempt to add a to the page header section if it is available to be modified.
The MIME media type of the link will be automatically selected based on the format unless the media type has been explicitly specified.
The title attribute will only be rendered if the control's property has been specified.

member.name: M:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.RenderControl(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Outputs server control content to a provided object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
member.param: The object that receives the control content.

remarks.para: The MIME media type of the link will be automatically selected based on the format unless the media type has been explicitly specified.
The title attribute will only be rendered if the control's property has been specified.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the that the auto-discoverable syndicated content conforms to.
member.value: The enumeration value that indicates the type of syndication format that auto-discoverable syndicated content conforms to.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.MediaType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME content type of the auto-discoverable syndicated content.
member.value: The IANA MIME media type for the auto-discoverable syndicated content. The default value is an empty string.
member.remarks: If a MIME media type is explictily specified, its value takes precedence over the MIME type that would be generated based on the format.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.NavigateUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the auto-discoverable syndicated content.
member.value: The URL to the auto-discoverable syndicated content. The default value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.remarks: Use the NavigateUrl property to specify the URL of the syndicated content you wish to broadcast as discoverable.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationAutoDiscoveryHyperlink.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name for the auto-discoverable syndicated content.
member.value: The display name for the auto-discoverable syndicated content. The default value is an empty string.

member.name: M:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.ProcessConditionalGetInformation(System.Web.HttpContext,Argotic.Common.ISyndicationResource)
member.summary: Processes conditional GET header information for the supplied .
member.param: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
The that is used when determining if conditional GET operation requirements were met.

remarks.para: This method will retrieve conditional GET information from the request headers, and if present, will set the appropriate response header information and status for the supplied . If a modification date is available for the supplied , the conditional GET header information will be set so that clients may optionally cache this infomration when making future requests.
If a conditional GET operation was fulflled, no additional processing or modification of the response should be performed.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.ContentUpdatableWithin
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of time after which clients may perform a background check and optional fetch of new content.
member.value: A that indicates to the browser that if the content is modified by the server and the resource is requested by the user within the specified time span to period, the browser displays the information found in the local cache but also performs a background check and optional fetch of the new content on the server. The default value is 15 minutes.

remarks.para:
The initialization order of precedence is as follows:
Application settings: If the httpHandler configuration section defines a updatableWithin attribute, its value takes precedence.
Runtime/programmatic: If content update period is not specified via application configuration, the property setter value takes precedence.
This property corresponds to the value of the post-check cache extension.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.ContentValidFor
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of time in which the handler content can be expected to not change.
member.value: A that indicates to the browser that the content will not change for the specified time span and instructs it to retrieve the content directly from the local cache. The default value is 60 minutes.

remarks.para:
The initialization order of precedence is as follows:
Application settings: If the httpHandler configuration section defines a validFor attribute, its value takes precedence.
Runtime/programmatic: If content expiration period is not specified via application configuration, the property setter value takes precedence.
This property corresponds to the value of the pre-check cache extension.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.EnableCaching
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the utilizes cache-specific HTTP headers and the output cache.
member.value: true if handler caching is enabled, otherwise returns false. The default value is true.

remarks.para:
The initialization order of precedence is as follows:
Application settings: If the httpHandler configuration section defines a enableCaching attribute, its value takes precedence.
Runtime/programmatic: If enable of caching is not specified via application configuration, the property setter value takes precedence.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the that this syndication resource handler processes.
member.value: The enumeration value that indicates the type of syndication format that this syndication resource handler processes. The default value is , whcih indicates that no content format was specified or configured.

remarks.para: The property determines the syndication content format that this will attempt to retrieve. The handler format can be specified via the query string or declaratively configured in the application configuration settings.

The initialization order of precedence is as follows:
Request query string parameter: If a format parameter exists, its value takes precedence.
Application settings: If format was not specified via the query string, and the httpHandler configuration section defines a format attribute, the configuration value takes precedence.
Runtime/programmatic: If format was not specified via the query string or via application configuration, the property setter value takes precedence.

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the content that this HTTP handler should generate.
member.value: An object that represents the unique identifier of the syndication resource served by this HTTP handler.

remarks.para:
The initialization order of precedence is as follows:
Request query string parameter: If an id parameter exists, its value takes precedence.
Application settings: If resource identifier was not specified via the query string, and the httpHandler configuration section defines a id attribute, the configuration value takes precedence.
Runtime/programmatic: If content identifier was not specified via the query string or via application configuration, the property setter value takes precedence.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandler.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.
member.value: true if the instance is reusable; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Argotic.Web.SyndicationResourceHandlerFactory
member.summary: HTTP handler factory used to create new objects.

remarks.para: By default the syndication handler factory will return a default instance of the class. However, if the configured path of the handler factory uses a supported syndication format as its name (e.g. apml.axd, atom.axd, blogml.axd, opml.axd, rsd.axd, rss.axd, etc.), the factory will automatically configure the handler to use the syndication format that matches the factory path name.
